snippet: The former Goldman Sachs trader Fabrice Tourre lost a closely watched legal battle when a jury found him liable on six counts of civil securities fraud. | A special committee of Dell’s board is near a compromise with the company’s founder. |...
abstract: The former Goldman Sachs trader Fabrice Tourre lost a closely watched legal battle when a jury found him liable on six counts of civil securities fraud. | A special committee of Dell’s board is near a compromise with the company’s founder. | Richard S. Lee, who was hired by SAC Capital Advisors despite warnings, proved crucial for the government’s case against the hedge fund.
